title: Horus Prince of the Sun
alternative_title: Taiyou no Ouji: Horus no Daibouken, The Little Norse Prince, 太陽の王子 ホルスの大冒険
description: Horus is a boy that one day, hunted by silver wolves, found the sword of the sun. The day his father died, he leaves his home to find the people from the town his father told him of. Together with a small bear namedKoro he starts his journey and runs into a great adventure, fighting against Grunwald and his subordinates who want to rule the world.
